              # é™æ€ä»£ç†

              åœ¨Javaä¸­æ‰‹åŠ¨å®ç°ä»£ç†æ¨¡å¼éå¸¸ç®€å•ï¼Œå®šä¹‰ä¸€ä¸ªæ¥å£ï¼Œä¸€ä¸ªå®ç°ç±»å’Œä¸€ä¸ªæŒæœ‰å®ç°ç±»çš„ä»£ç†ç±»ï¼Œä¸‹é¢ä»¥çŸ­ä¿¡å‘é€ä¸ºä¾‹

              çŸ­ä¿¡å‘é€æ¥å£

              package proxy;

public interface SmsService {
    void send(String str);
}

              çŸ­ä¿¡å‘é€å®ç°ç±»

              package proxy;

public class SmsServiceImpl implements SmsService {
    @Override
    public void send(String str) {
        System.out.println("impl send " + str);
    }
}

              çŸ­ä¿¡å‘é€ä»£ç†ç±»

              package proxy;

public class SmsProxy implements SmsService {
    private final SmsService smsService;

    public SmsProxy(SmsService smsService) {
        this.smsService = smsService;
    }

    @Override
    public void send(String str) {
        System.out.println("before send");
        this.smsService.send(str);
        System.out.println("after send");
    }
}

              ä¸å¤Ÿçµæ´»ï¼Œæ¯ä¸ªç›®æ ‡ç±»éƒ½éœ€è¦åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªä»£ç†ç±»ï¼Œæ¥å£ä¸€æ—¦å˜æ›´ï¼Œç›®æ ‡ç±»å’Œä»£ç†ç±»éƒ½éœ€è¦è¿›è¡Œä¿®æ”¹

              # åŠ¨æ€ä»£ç†

              å°± Java æ¥è¯´ï¼ŒåŠ¨æ€ä»£ç†çš„å®ç°æ–¹å¼æœ‰å¾ˆå¤šç§ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚ JDK åŠ¨æ€ä»£ç†ã€CGLIB åŠ¨æ€ä»£ç†ç­‰ç­‰

              # JDKåŠ¨æ€ä»£ç†

              ä¸»è¦ç±»å’Œæ¥å£ï¼Œä»£ç†ç±»éœ€è¦å®ç°InvocationHandlerçš„invokeæ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå†é€šè¿‡Proxy.newProxyInstance(ClassLoader loader, Class<?>[] interfaces, InvocationHandler h);æ–¹æ³•è·å–ä»£ç†ç±»çš„å®ä¾‹ï¼Œä»è€Œå®Œæˆç›®æ ‡ç±»çš„å¢å¼ºï¼› è¿˜æ˜¯ä»¥çŸ­ä¿¡å‘é€ä¸ºä¾‹å­

              çŸ­ä¿¡å‘é€æ¥å£

              package proxy;

public interface SmsService {
    void send(String str);
}

              å®ç°ç±»

              package proxy;

public class JdkSmsServiceImpl implements SmsService {
    @Override
    public void send(String str) {
        System.out.printf("impl send %s", str);
    }
}

              ä»£ç†ç±»

              package proxy;

import java.lang.reflect.InvocationHandler;
import java.lang.reflect.Method;

public class JdkSmsProxy implements InvocationHandler {
    /**
     * ä»£ç†ç±»ä¸­çš„çœŸå®å¯¹è±¡
     */
    private final Object target;

    public JdkSmsProxy(Object target) {
        this.target = target;
    }

    @Override
    public Object invoke(Object proxy, Method method, Object[] args) throws Throwable {
        //è°ƒç”¨æ–¹æ³•ä¹‹å‰ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥æ·»åŠ è‡ªå·±çš„æ“ä½œ
        System.out.println("before method " + method.getName());
        Object result = method.invoke(target, args);
        //è°ƒç”¨æ–¹æ³•ä¹‹åï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬åŒæ ·å¯ä»¥æ·»åŠ è‡ªå·±çš„æ“ä½œ
        System.out.println("after method " + method.getName());
        return result;
    }
}

              è·å–ä»£ç†ç±»å®ä¾‹

              public class JdkProxyFactory {
    public static Object getProxy(Object target) {
        return Proxy.newProxyInstance(
                // ç›®æ ‡ç±»çš„ç±»åŠ è½½
                target.getClass().getClassLoader(),
                // ä»£ç†éœ€è¦å®ç°çš„æ¥å£ï¼Œå¯æŒ‡å®šå¤šä¸ª
                target.getClass().getInterfaces(),
                // ä»£ç†å¯¹è±¡å¯¹åº”çš„è‡ªå®šä¹‰ InvocationHandler
                new JdkSmsProxy(target)
        );
    }
}

public class Main {
    public static void main(String[] args) throws NoSuchMethodException {
        SmsService smsService = (SmsService) JdkProxyFactory.getProxy(new JdkSmsServiceImpl());
        smsService.send("proxy");
    }
}

              JDK åŠ¨æ€ä»£ç†æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªæœ€è‡´å‘½çš„é—®é¢˜æ˜¯å…¶åªèƒ½ä»£ç†å®ç°äº†æ¥å£çš„ç±»

              # CGLIBåŠ¨æ€ä»£ç†

              CGLIBopen in new window(Code Generation Library)æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªåŸºäºASMopen in new windowçš„å­—èŠ‚ç ç”Ÿæˆåº“ï¼Œå®ƒå…è®¸æˆ‘ä»¬åœ¨è¿è¡Œæ—¶å¯¹å­—èŠ‚ç è¿›è¡Œä¿®æ”¹å’ŒåŠ¨æ€ç”Ÿæˆã€‚CGLIB é€šè¿‡ç»§æ‰¿æ–¹å¼å®ç°ä»£ç† Spring ä¸­çš„ AOP æ¨¡å—ä¸­ï¼šå¦‚æœç›®æ ‡å¯¹è±¡å®ç°äº†æ¥å£ï¼Œåˆ™é»˜è®¤é‡‡ç”¨ JDK åŠ¨æ€ä»£ç†ï¼Œå¦åˆ™é‡‡ç”¨ CGLIB åŠ¨æ€ä»£ç†ã€‚

              åœ¨ CGLIB åŠ¨æ€ä»£ç†æœºåˆ¶ä¸­ MethodInterceptor æ¥å£å’Œ Enhancer ç±»æ˜¯æ ¸å¿ƒ

              ç›®æ ‡ç±»

              package proxy;

public class CgLibService {
    public void send(String str) {
        System.out.println("send " + str);
    }
}

              ç›®æ ‡ç±»æ‹¦æˆªå™¨

              package proxy;

import net.sf.cglib.proxy.MethodInterceptor;
import net.sf.cglib.proxy.MethodProxy;

import java.lang.reflect.Method;

public class CgLibInterceptor implements MethodInterceptor {
    /**
     * @param o           è¢«ä»£ç†çš„å¯¹è±¡ï¼ˆéœ€è¦å¢å¼ºçš„å¯¹è±¡ï¼‰
     * @param method      è¢«æ‹¦æˆªçš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼ˆéœ€è¦å¢å¼ºçš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼‰
     * @param args        æ–¹æ³•å…¥å‚
     * @param methodProxy ç”¨äºè°ƒç”¨åŸå§‹æ–¹æ³•
     */
    @Override
    public Object intercept(Object o, Method method, Object[] args, MethodProxy methodProxy) throws Throwable {
        //è°ƒç”¨æ–¹æ³•ä¹‹å‰ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥æ·»åŠ è‡ªå·±çš„æ“ä½œ
        System.out.println("before method " + method.getName());
        Object object = methodProxy.invokeSuper(o, args);
        //è°ƒç”¨æ–¹æ³•ä¹‹åï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬åŒæ ·å¯ä»¥æ·»åŠ è‡ªå·±çš„æ“ä½œ
        System.out.println("after method " + method.getName());
        return object;
    }
}

              é€šè¿‡Enhanceråˆ›å»ºä»£ç†ç±»

              package proxy;

import net.sf.cglib.proxy.Enhancer;

public class CglibProxyFactory {
    public static Object getProxy(Class<?> clazz) {
        // åˆ›å»ºåŠ¨æ€ä»£ç†å¢å¼ºç±»
        Enhancer enhancer = new Enhancer();
        // è®¾ç½®ç±»åŠ è½½å™¨
        enhancer.setClassLoader(clazz.getClassLoader());
        // è®¾ç½®è¢«ä»£ç†ç±»
        enhancer.setSuperclass(clazz);
        // è®¾ç½®æ–¹æ³•æ‹¦æˆªå™¨
        enhancer.setCallback(new CgLibInterceptor());
        // åˆ›å»ºä»£ç†ç±»
        return enhancer.create();
    }
}

              è·å–ä»£ç†ç±»å¹¶æ‰§è¡Œ

              public class Main {
    public static void main(String[] args) throws NoSuchMethodException {
        CgLibService smsService = (CgLibService) CglibProxyFactory.getProxy(CgLibService.class);
        smsService.send("test");
    }
}

              # æ€»ç»“

              JDK åŠ¨æ€ä»£ç†åªèƒ½ä»£ç†å®ç°äº†æ¥å£çš„ç±»æˆ–è€…ç›´æ¥ä»£ç†æ¥å£ï¼Œè€Œ CGLIB å¯ä»¥ä»£ç†æœªå®ç°ä»»ä½•æ¥å£çš„ç±»ã€‚ å¦å¤–ï¼Œ CGLIB åŠ¨æ€ä»£ç†æ˜¯é€šè¿‡ç”Ÿæˆä¸€ä¸ªè¢«ä»£ç†ç±»çš„å­ç±»æ¥æ‹¦æˆªè¢«ä»£ç†ç±»çš„æ–¹æ³•è°ƒç”¨ï¼Œå› æ­¤ä¸èƒ½ä»£ç†å£°æ˜ä¸º final ç±»å‹çš„ç±»å’Œæ–¹æ³•ã€‚å°±äºŒè€…çš„æ•ˆç‡æ¥è¯´ï¼Œå¤§éƒ¨åˆ†æƒ…å†µéƒ½æ˜¯ JDK åŠ¨æ€ä»£ç†æ›´ä¼˜ç§€ï¼Œéšç€ JDK ç‰ˆæœ¬çš„å‡çº§ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªä¼˜åŠ¿æ›´åŠ æ˜æ˜¾ã€‚
